mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dabao_tuiyao_source WHERE date like CONCAT(#{date},'%') AND type = #{type}
mapper.select: SELECT keshi, SUM(value) value, ROUND((SUM(value)/b.t)*100,2) rate, b.t sum FROM dabao_tuiyao_source a, ( SELECT SUM(value) t FROM dabao_tuiyao_source WHERE date like CONCAT(#{date},'%') AND type = #{type} )b WHERE date like CONCAT(#{date},'%') AND type = #{type} GROUP BY keshi HAVING SUM(value) != 0 ORDER BY rate DESC
